shortdesc.ph: States of the RTMP or RTMPS streaming.

plentry.pd: The RTMP or RTMPS streaming has not started or has ended. The SDK successfully publishes the RTMP or RTMPS streaming and returns this state.
The SDK is connecting to Agora's streaming server and the CDN server. The SDK successfully publishes the RTMP or RTMPS streaming and returns this state.
The RTMP or RTMPS streaming publishes. The SDK successfully publishes the RTMP or RTMPS streaming and returns this state.

pd.p: The RTMP or RTMPS streaming is recovering. When exceptions occur to the CDN, or the streaming is interrupted, the SDK tries to resume RTMP or RTMPS streaming and returns this state.

ul.li: If the push is resumed successfully, it will enter state (2).
If the server fails or fails to recover within 60 seconds, it enters state (4). If you think 60 seconds is too long, you can also actively call and methods to try to reconnect.

plentry.pd: The RTMP or RTMPS streaming fails. After the failure, you can use the returned error code to troubleshoot the cause of the error, or you can call it again and try to push the stream again.
